home.title: Unified Crypto Exchange
home.description: A unified platform for P2P crypto-to-fiat trading, cross-chain DEX, and aggregation.

p2p.title: P2P Trading
p2p.heading: P2P Crypto Exchange
p2p.description: This is the P2P trading section where users can buy and sell cryptocurrencies directly with each other using various payment methods.

dex.title: DEX/Aggregator
dex.heading: Cross-Chain DEX/Aggregator
dex.description: This is the DEX/Aggregator section where users can swap tokens across different blockchains.

dashboard.title: User Dashboard
dashboard.greeting: Welcome to your dashboard. Here you can view your transaction history and manage your account.
